channel.title: Age of Ravens - The Dread Hangover
channel.description: On the Gauntlet Blog today, I present my *Dread* scenario "The Dread Hangover," a one-shot horror scenario easily adapted to other games. https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/age-of-ravens-the-dread-hangover

item.title: Age of Ravens - The Dread Hangover
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

I really enjoyed it. I like Dread, but there’s a lot of set up and mechanical aspects to it that don’t work as well with how I run these days. I know there’s lots of new options for one-shot horror games, but I haven’t really delved into those.

Read full topic
item.source: Age of Ravens - The Dread Hangover

item.title: Age of Ravens - The Dread Hangover
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

On the Gauntlet Blog today, I present my Dread scenario “The Dread Hangover,” a one-shot horror scenario easily adapted to other games.

THE GAUNTLET

Age of Ravens: The Dread Hangover

It Does Not Stay in Vegas... On this penultimate day of October, I want to present one of my favorite horror one-shots.  I ran this several years ago using Dread . The set up, explanation, and...
